text: Barkhera is a town and a nagar panchayat in Pilibhit district in the Indian state of Uttar Pradesh. ==Geography== Barkhera is located at .Falling Rain Genomics, Inc - Barkhera It has an average elevation of . ==Demographics== At the 2001 Census of India, Barkhera had a population of 9,881 (males 54%, females 46%). Barkhera had an average literacy rate of 41% (70% male; 30% female), lower than the national average of 59.5%. 20% of the population was under 6 years of age. ==References== Category:Cities and towns in Pilibhit district
title: Barkhera
